title: 12/30/21 DPS Hour 3 Doug Gottlieb & TJ Houshmandzadeh Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 12/30/21 DPS Hour 3 Doug Gottlieb & TJ Houshmandzadeh Guest Hosting
description:
Doug and TJ talk about Lebron James as he turns 37 years old, and how his Lakers have struggled for most of the first part of the season. Bill Belichick had something interesting things to say about the late John Madden. NFL Analyst Daniel Jeremiah joins the guys to talk about the impact John Madden had on him as a broadcaster, what Ben Roethlisberger's legacy is, and to go over the major headlines going into week 17. Plus, Doug and TJ discuss the college football playoff and who they think will come out of this weekend.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
